Hi. I'm Zakaria Bennane.

I'm a Web Developer and Digital Marketer with a passion for Entrepreneurship. Get in touch?

Weather App

Weather data for any city in the world. This was the first time I integrate an API into my project using the OpenWeatherMap.

HTML CSS JS WebPack

Proderto

After a year long learning all I could about web developement, I decided to build something from the ground up, and the result was Proderto - a goal sharing platform for the Internet.

NodeJs ExpressJS ReactJS CSS MongoDB

SumBroo

SumBroo is an idea I had in the summer of 2023. The concept? Applying the idea of blog posting to social media, but on a larger scale. I couldn't move forward with this project as I reached out to hundreds of social media creators (mainly Pinteresters) and most couldn't see the value of the platform, so I had to shut it down (but you still can access the site).

NodeJS ExpressJS ReactJS NextJS APIs MongoDB CSS
